required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on October 07, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Impact of COVID-19 Pandemic to Trauma Patients in Emergency Department: A Multicenter Experience of Istanbul
clinical_study.official_title: The Impact of COVID-19 Pandemic to Trauma Patients in Emergency Department: A Multicenter Experience of Istanbul

lead_sponsor.agency: Kanuni Sultan Suleyman Training and Research Hospital

clinical_study.source: Kanuni Sultan Suleyman Training and Research Hospital

brief_summary.textblock: COVID-19, which emerged in China in December 2019, has become a pandemic with its spread to many countries of the world. The aim of this multi-centered study is to guide for the approach, organization, diagnosis and treatment of the patients admitted due to trauma to emergency department during the pandemic period.

detailed_description.textblock: COVID-19, which emerged in China in December 2019, has become a pandemic with its spread to many countries of the world. The investigators hypothesize that since the number of hospital applications expected to be decreased due to trauma during the COVID-19 period, the level of hospital trauma applications changed. Thus, the aim of this multi-centered study is to guide for the approach, organization, diagnosis and treatment of the patients admitted due to trauma to emergency department during the pandemic period.

primary_outcome.description: within the study period, trauma patients who admitted to any of the seven study centers will be recorded.

intervention.description: Nasopharyngeal samples were analyzed by PCR for the detection of Novel Coronavirus 2019 DNA

study_pop.textblock: The patients who admitted to any of the emergency departments of seven study centers during the pandemic will be evaluated.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- accepted to participate with an informed consent
- trauma patients who admitted to the study centers
Exclusion Criteria:
- lack of informed consent
- lack of data

facility.name: Istanbul Kanuni Sultan Suleyman Training and Research Hospital

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Kanuni Sultan Suleyman Training and Research Hospital
